body.value: <font color="lightgrey">I wonder that there are these wholes that we constantly seek out. I wonder. I was raised in a tradition that believes very much in whole, in the whole in the beauty of the whole. That a thing is good when it is beautiful, a thing is beautiful when it is whole, that wholeness and beauty and health all go together, that those are all the same thing. And so on the one hand I was brought up in a tradition that, that holds very dearly to that principle.</font>
